text: niyata vasayenma allah vanuye maryamge put masih yæyi pævasu aya pratiksepakayin bavata pat vuha. israil daruvani, mage paramadhipati da numbalage paramadhipati da vana allahta numbala gætikam karanu yæyi masih pævasuveya. sæbæ karuna nam kavareku allahta adesa tabanne da evita allah ohuta svargaya tahanam kaleya. tavada ohu længum ganna sthanaya niraya ve. aparadhakaruvanta udav karannan kisivaku nomæta
